title: Textile, "Military scenes", ca. 1840
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave
dimensions:
Warp: 161cm (53 1/4in.)
Weft: 77.5cm (30 1/2in.) Both selvedges present. 
height of repeat: 38.5cm
description: Humorous scenes of military life within a diamond lattice of flowers and leaves. There is a text in French under each of the three scenes but as the design is 'slurred' the text is difficult to read. unreadable.

tombstone.epitaph:
Textile, "Military scenes", ca. 1840.
ca. 1840. Medium: cotton
Technique: printed by engraved roller on plain weave. Bequest of Elinor Merrell. 1995-50-177.
